description:
The next stop is the Rainy Pond. They will be stopped there for 64 hours and 23 minutes. Tetsuro and Maetel check into their hotel on this planet where the rain never stops. But, a man who was also on the 999 makes a big fuss. He spends the night reciting sutras and bothering the other 999 passengers in the hotel. The man says he is praying because there is a witch on that planet who eats people`s souls and he doesn`t want anyone to be harmed. Maetel says she`s heard of this witch before...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Saintly Woman Who Devours Souls: Part One
